nodes.title: JaCoCo: Switch from binary (deprecated) to xml report.
Add basic level policy support to Ditto Java Client
Set response-required to false if no response consumer is specified
Enhancements of Ditto Java client for signal enrichment of events/messages
prepared API breaker plugin for post 1.0.0
Response header mapping adjustments for Ditto PR
Improved javadoc of client credentials authentication configuration
added flatten-maven-plugin and configured it to flatten the pom
[js] fix rollup configuration and prepare release 1.0.0-pre2
got rid of caching "not found" selectors in the cache which caused a memory leak
added profiles to build a release
ditto java client with typed entity ids
fixed that responses were no longer correlated after PR #3
[Java] Fix that only one consumer got changes
Initial version of the JavaScript client
allow to directly send DittoProtocol Adaptables via the DittoClient
Initial code contribution for the Eclipse Ditto Java client SDK
fixed that for Java Runtime 8, using corePoolSize 0 leads to CPU usage  of 100%
Support for conditional updates via Ditto Java client
enhanced OSGi test for instantiating classes relying on ClassIndex import
Enhance Ditto java client with a "disconnection listener"
Fix incorrect variable replacement for messageSubject in featureSelector
Improve reconnect behavior for unintentional disconnects
Prepare changelog for the 2.1.0 release of the JS client
Send query params in node client
Fix encoding of search options, which did encode the sorting option twice
add websocket auth provider for dom environments
[Javascript] Add support for _created field from v2 API
Adapt extracting of Live-Response from acknowledgement
fixed license declaration of Ditto JavaScript client in package.json files
Enhance Ditto Java Client usage examples - esp. the small loadtest
Add merge update functionality to ditto client
Fix serialization of booleans and numbers in filters
exclude "foreign" license texts from Ditto-client jar
Ditto issue #921: Deprecated HttpStatusCode and replaced it with HttpStatus
Remove the IIFE build from the API and DOM modules
Add possibility to set custom api path
added commit hook for checking that license header's year
Ditto-java-client bugfix: When starting consumption with invalid filter, wrongly timeout exception is propagate to the user
Ignore flappy unit test until fixed
Fix handling of parallel startConsumption() invocation
Fix FeatureChange consumation for specific feature change-registration
Add events for desired properties to ThingChange
Allow declaration of acknowledgements for Ditto Java Client
Notify error handler on initial connection error if initial reconnection is deactivated.
fix unit test for live message negative acknowledgement
adjusted Ditto Event API usage to Ditto metadata bugfix
Issue #87: Prevent leakage of AdaptableBus threads after closing the client
Add possibility to enable/disable inital connection retries
Add support for e2e acknowledgements also for live messages/commands
Fix WebSocketMessagingProvider blocking forever on initialization when configured with an incorrect endpoint
Add option to get notified for connection errors
fix PUT request for existing thing
Rework reconnect behaviour of java client
Allow to respond to live messages via ditto client
End-2-end acks for Ditto Java Client
Add search support and restructure messaging providers.
Append ws path only if needed
